lead_paragraph: A two-day memorial and a period of “Duelo Nacional,” or national mourning, will offer Cubans a chance to pay their respects to the longtime leader.

headline.print_headline: Cubans Prepare for Mourning Period and Chance to Bid Castro Farewell
headline.main: Subdued Cuba Prepares Memorial for Castro

snippet: A two-day memorial and a period of “Duelo Nacional,” or national mourning, will offer Cubans a chance to pay their respects to the longtime leader....
abstract: Cuba prepares two-day memorial for recently deceased dictator Fidel Castro, as part of nine-day national mourning period.
